body: I think the doujin not going overboard with the 'scat' part like too many works do and keeping it toned down to being just "girl having stomachache and endure it with increasingly desperate expression, then letting it out for relief" make it one of few favorite scat works here. (Seriously, why can't there be more of these?) I want an English translation for this because I'm curious what exactly was in her tummy and how did she ended up being injected with that thing in her ass.
fucking an ass with shit just adds texture to the asshole, can confirm. Btw this has to be my new favorite scat doujin
Good art but how can people be turned on by shit... I can somewhat understand feet, but shit? Wtf
Wouldnt your weiner get an infection if the poo got in your urethra
How you gonna fuck an un-wiped ass that just shitted
